website_summaries.verdict: A classic-style pram sized just right for Baby Alive dolls, with plenty of storage for toy bottles and more.
pros: Easy to assemble and lightweight enough for toddlers to push around
Folds down flat when not in use
cons: Underhanging storage bag may hang too low and drag to the ground

customer_reviews.title: Durable and super cute
customer_reviews.text: My 2 girls (5 and 3) have wrecked the strollers we had in the past. These, they can't sit in them for giving each other a 'ride' so that helps a lot! But they LOVE the old pram style of it for their baby dolls and the basket underneath doesn't detach easily so they are holding up very well. We go on walks on our gravel road and the wheels are very sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: Nathan

customer_reviews.title: Cheaply made, flimsy
customer_reviews.text: I’d give this zero stars if I could! The storage underneath hangs low to the ground, is not adjustable, and ripped after one day! My daughter put her doll diaper bag underneath, nothing heavy. Spend $10 more and get the Graco
customer_reviews.author: S Carr

customer_reviews.title: Missing parts!
customer_reviews.text: Box came damaged and it was missing parts so I can’t put the wheels on; can’t very well push a stroller without the wheels. Trying to return this but it doesn’t give me the option so I’ll write this instead.
customer_reviews.author: L.info

customer_reviews.title: Best present ever!!
customer_reviews.text: I swear this is the best present I ever bought for my granddaughter! She opened this and immediately took off with it to find her babies at the party!!! She was done opening presents!!! It was so cute!! She loves it!! It's sturdy and hold up to her hauling it everywhere! Great purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Tammy

customer_reviews.title: Too tiny, not support for doll.
customer_reviews.text: Too tiny , not support for doll. A bag with wheels
customer_reviews.author: carol burnett

customer_reviews.title: Affordable and cute stroller
customer_reviews.text: I promised my daughter to purchase a doll stroller, and this one had a great reviews and price, and we were happy that we chose it! It was easy to assemble, quite stable and cute. My daughter really loves her stroller. One thing - it looks slightly not sturdy, might break if one plays roughly. But overall - great gift!
customer_reviews.author: Anastasia D

customer_reviews.title: Brought lots of smile
customer_reviews.text: Was the perfect fit for my 3 year old great granddaughter. The adjustable handle will fit as she grows.
customer_reviews.author: art edelson

customer_reviews.title: Can't recommend
customer_reviews.text: This doll stroller is very beautiful, delicate colors. My daughter really liked it when I gave it for her birthday. but not even 1 month has start passed since it broke. and I can’t return it. so the quality is not the best, I can’t recommend it
customer_reviews.author: Iryna

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality.
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves this, unfortunately the quality of the cloth & stitching is poor. Opened Christmas day and within 15 minutes of play the stitching came undone at the seams.
customer_reviews.author: Rachael Trundle

customer_reviews.title: Nice but a little short for taller kids
customer_reviews.text: My older daughter (7) wanted a stroller for her dolls, and we got this one for her as the one we bought for my younger daughter wasn’t available anymore. This is nice and she loves that the bassinet can be removed but it’s on the shorter side. I know These are meant for maybe younger kids but 2 inches won’t make that much of a difference for the younger ones and it does make a huge difference for the taller or older kids.
customer_reviews.author: Maria Treviño Hernandez

customer_reviews.title: Cheap material
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my niece for Christmas, material started falling apart, bottom storage compartment torn half way off and random frayed strings dangling everywhere within a month of opening. Very cheaply made. Exchanged in hopes it was a defective one, seller sent replacement in a timely manner so that was nice.
customer_reviews.author: Willie N Tina

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Just a bit smaller than I anticipated but very nice. And easy to assemble
customer_reviews.author: Leigh Anne Light

customer_reviews.title: Very happy with my purchase!
customer_reviews.text: This is one of the best doll strollers I have ever purchased. I like how neat the stroller collapses and folds. I like how all of the fabric can be removed and turn into a little carrier, etc. The assembly was easy and the wheels don't squeak when my daughter pushes it. This is a great upgrade from the original stroller.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not user friendly
customer_reviews.text: Cute but not easy for a small child to use. The ‘basket’ is flimsy material so it’s not sturdy at all. Plus getting the baby doll inside is difficult for our granddaughter as the material is sewn permanently two thirds of the way on top. Putting a blanket on the baby doll while in buggy can’t be done. I would return it if it wasn’t for it being a Christmas gift.
customer_reviews.author: Lori M

customer_reviews.title: Fabric rips easily
customer_reviews.text: This is adorable and my daughter loves pushing it around but the fabric does not hold up well. I returned my first one because it has a rip in it and the new one that was sent did it in the same exact spot only a week after having it. Very disappointed
customer_reviews.author: Tearsa Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Bad fabric choice
customer_reviews.text: I ordered it once, and one of the seams was torn so badly the bassinet portion was hanging. Exchanged it for a second, and another seam was torn. The fabric they used is slippery in texture and the stitching doesn’t hold. I have used fabric glue in the second to help it work for now.
customer_reviews.author: Kimblwl

customer_reviews.title: Great for price simply adorable
customer_reviews.text: Very nice great to also assist a new Walker or a child learning to work while holding on
customer_reviews.author: baarbara

customer_reviews.title: Doll carriage
customer_reviews.text: As pictured. Prompt delivery. My granddaughter loved it. She plays with it all the time, and even takes her dolls for a walk outside in it. Her younger sibling loves to push it also. Thanks very happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: S. Des

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy, snaps together in no time, rolls well, holds several dolls or stuffed animals
customer_reviews.text: 3 y/o loves this stroller! Easy to snap together, rolls very well, she can put her baby alive plus numerous other things in this as well so it has a large capacity. Would recommend this
customer_reviews.author: A. Cornell

customer_reviews.title: Great but...
customer_reviews.text: The stroller is definitely sturdy to put up with my 2 and 4 year old girls. The only issue is that the top part of the bassinet doesn't come off so they have a harder time trying to put their babies in the stroller since the cover doesn't come off.
customer_reviews.author: Andréa

customer_reviews.title: Very durable
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my 3 year old daughter. It is the perfect size. She uses it for another baby doll instead of the baby alive baby doll. Works just the same as any other baby doll carriage.
customer_reviews.author: Shopaholic Mommy

customer_reviews.title: Nice size.
customer_reviews.text: My granddaughter loved it. I think it should have some padding in the pram. I also think the covering should be able to fold down to make getting her babies in and out easier. My granddaughter loves how many babies and stuffed animals she can get in the pram.
customer_reviews.author: Tamela L. Proctor

customer_reviews.title: great for small kids
customer_reviews.text: great product make sure to buy it for small kids only, a 5 year old is probably the oldest age that can use it it's very low handles. There is also no option of making the doll sitting.
customer_reviews.author: amazon fan!

customer_reviews.title: Cute but flimsy
customer_reviews.text: The pram is very easy to put together. But, when I put the wheels on, they simply fell off. They did not fit. I had to use gorilla glue to hold them on. Not sure if this will hold. But, will see. Plus, the bottom part is very low to the floor.
customer_reviews.author: Vanessa Robinson

customer_reviews.title: Super cute!
customer_reviews.text: If you want it, buy it, it is super cute and adorable, I LOVE IT!
customer_reviews.author: Damaris H.

customer_reviews.title: Adorable!
customer_reviews.text: So adorable! We got this for my 1.5 year old for Christmas and she just loves it. It’s the perfect height for her to use now and she can grow into It. She loves pushing it around the neighbor hood.
customer_reviews.author: Kara R

customer_reviews.title: Wheels fall off
customer_reviews.text: This is the worst stroller I have ever seen! There is no stability for the wheels and they continuously fall off! Definitely not worth the money!
customer_reviews.author: Celeste

customer_reviews.title: Stroller. Great for for younger ages
customer_reviews.text: The top little blanket looking piece in the picture will not fold down. Wheels are not super durable imo
customer_reviews.author: Melissa B.

customer_reviews.title: Baby basket with snaps
customer_reviews.text: Too short for little girl, not able to adjust handle. A little girl would have a hard time figuring out how to get basket in and out with the snaps.
customer_reviews.author: Diane C. Richie

customer_reviews.title: Arrived Broken
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my daughter for Christmas this year. It came with broken snaps which did not allow the pram to connect right. I started the return and realized I couldn't fit the stroller into the original packaging. When I called customer service I spoke to two woman. The first one was very nice, unfortunately I was disconnected. The second was hard to understand (noisy background) and extremely rude. I've never had a worse expirence with Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: Jgale

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Stroller
customer_reviews.text: My daughter LOVES this stroller for her baby dolls. It's really easy to assemble and fold up, which makes it great for storing away. Most importantly it's sturdy when pushing and my daughter is a rough 4 year old. The only thing I would change is the basket/netting on the bottom of it. It' never stays in place. Definitely worth purchasing though.
customer_reviews.author: Victoria

customer_reviews.title: Buttons/clasps won’t stay snapped
customer_reviews.text: My only issue with this stroller is the buttons holding the fabric on to the rods do not stay closed. It takes a very small amount of pressure or weight for them to be pulled apart and for the fabric of the carrier to pull away from the rods.
customer_reviews.author: Maro

customer_reviews.title: Must have for little mommy!
customer_reviews.text: The five year old liked it so much, we got one for her 3 year old cousin as well! So adorable, and very similar in price to no-name brands for basically the same thing!
customer_reviews.author: Matt B.

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: My daughter absolutely loves her stroller. It’s sturdy enough to withstand the hands of a 4 year old. The only thing that I do not like is that it’s a little difficult for a young child to put the “basket” back on the frame without help.
customer_reviews.author: Tristan

customer_reviews.title: Item was in great shape
customer_reviews.text: Advertised as damaged box but item was great. No problems with parts or assembly. Glad I was able to get a discounted price. Definitely would buy again with the advertisement.
customer_reviews.author: Michele Rene

customer_reviews.title: Granddaughter Loves It!
customer_reviews.text: My 3-year-old granddaughter loves this stroller!! She received it for Christmas. Assembly was minimal and easy, and our granddaughter was pushing the stroller with her baby doll in it moments after opening the gift. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Kim Paras

customer_reviews.title: Cute, but poor quality.
customer_reviews.text: The stroller is adorable, but started to fall apart within a week of purchase. The fabric ripped in multiple places after typical use. My daughter was excited to remove the baby carrier from the stroller and, by the third day, the fabric was ripping away from the snaps and had torn along the seam. My daughter is 5 and is not overly rough on toys. The quality of this stroller is simply subpar.
customer_reviews.author: DiligentBuyer

customer_reviews.title: Great Product!
customer_reviews.text: All three of my granddaughters loved this stroller! It comes apart to convert to a carrier and folds easily to take with. Very well made and sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: Keller

customer_reviews.title: Perfect stroller
customer_reviews.text: This is one of my daughter’s favorite gift from Christmas! This was really easy to assemble. I believe it was collapsed and we just popped it out but it was Easy!! She enjoys putting her baby in it and going around. It was exactly as I expected it to be. If I ever buy another one, it would be this one
customer_reviews.author: Jenifer Yon-Ovando

customer_reviews.title: Toddler gift
customer_reviews.text: This was my daughters Christmas gift and she loves it! Arrived on time. Good quality stroller.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: Love it.
customer_reviews.text: This is the cutest little stroller it feels like a real stroller when your pushing it my daughter absolutely loves it!
customer_reviews.author: lindz_4413

customer_reviews.title: GREAT!
customer_reviews.text: This is the best stroller I’ve bought. Very sturdy and cute bassinet type look to it. Worth every penny!
customer_reviews.author: Erica G.

customer_reviews.title: A perfect girf
customer_reviews.text: This little girl stroller was amazing. She just turned 4 and it was the perfect height for her. It came with all the parts. She was in love with it.
customer_reviews.author: Christal

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy Buggy
customer_reviews.text: My granddaughter loves playing will baby dolls and I wanted a quality baby buggy for her. This buggy is well made.
customer_reviews.author: Charlotte

customer_reviews.title: Great buy!
customer_reviews.text: Love this product. My kiddos love it. I just wish the bassinet had sturdier bottom. Other than that it’s great!!!
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie Tatum

customer_reviews.title: Seems to be Sturdy
customer_reviews.text: My two-year old granddaughter loves it, but she climbed into it and it collapsed. She is still playing with it, so it must have been fine.
customer_reviews.author: LaV

customer_reviews.title: Great for the price
customer_reviews.text: Good quality stroller, easy to assemble & great gift for my daughter
customer_reviews.author: Angela

customer_reviews.title: cute baby doll toy
customer_reviews.text: this buggy was so easy for little one to play with and put together folded down for storage which is really nice granddaughter loved it
customer_reviews.author: Margaret

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: This stroller is fantastic! Best doll stroller we’ve ever bought!
customer_reviews.author: Jeff M

customer_reviews.title: Every girl needs one
customer_reviews.text: My granddaughter is so THRILLED with this, is is very well made
customer_reviews.author: JoAnn Hamilton Dillon

customer_reviews.title: So Cute
customer_reviews.text: My daughter love a baby alive stroller it is so cute and she is happy with it not bad for the price ..
customer_reviews.author: qurint

customer_reviews.title: Daughter loved it
customer_reviews.text: I was hoping it would fit more of her dolls but she loves it.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Fox

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase
customer_reviews.text: Great price. Durable. Enough space for two baby alive dolls
customer_reviews.author: Dorothy Simmons

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: This was a Christmas gift for my granddaughter she loves it. Its light weight and easy for her to open and close it all on her own.
customer_reviews.author: April Roher Coverdale

customer_reviews.title: Great value buy
customer_reviews.text: Very cute. Great addition. My daughter and her friends love playing with it.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Smith

customer_reviews.title: Pretty
customer_reviews.text: Very pretty stroller. If the handle was a bit higher or adjustable it would get 5 Star but my 6 year old loves it.
customer_reviews.author: Chris Brandwood

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful design an quality
customer_reviews.text: Little smaller than I expected, but it still worth the price. She loved it. She is just a little bigger than most little girls who want this.
customer_reviews.author: Jo Higgins

customer_reviews.title: The doll buggy was strong and worked beautifully
customer_reviews.text: Adorable and sturdy, easy assembly and just the right size for my great -granddaughter!
customer_reviews.author: Anne Vanoni

customer_reviews.title: Stroller for walking
customer_reviews.text: She loves the stroller it wants to take it every where and it’s a little too big to just take everywhere in the car. Better for the summer to walk around everywhere.
customer_reviews.author: Gretchen Rivera

customer_reviews.title: Nice toy stroller kids love it
customer_reviews.text: I gave it 4 stars because the locks get off all the time. The bassinet has no support and losses it shape.
customer_reviews.author: Carolina del Mar

customer_reviews.title: Adorable carriage
customer_reviews.text: It was very cute and the 13 inch doll fit it quite nice a little more fancy then most I’ve seen in the stores
customer_reviews.author: Sandy

customer_reviews.title: Fast Shipping Easy assembly
customer_reviews.text: Came in 1 day and was super easy to put together.
customer_reviews.author: HopeFaithnpRay

customer_reviews.title: Great Stroller built well
customer_reviews.text: This stroller is very is sturdy and also such a good price. Fits my three year old daughter perfectly
customer_reviews.author: Melinda

customer_reviews.title: Fallimg apart and rust!
customer_reviews.text: This didnt even last a year. Weve had this stroller for around 8/9 months and the cloth is falling apart and its already rusting. I wouldnt pay 10 dollars for this. Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Nina

customer_reviews.title: Plastic wheels are a terrible design
customer_reviews.text: The plastic wheels snap and break very easily. This is my 2nd pram due to weak wheels. This toy is not designed to last.
customer_reviews.author: redcivic

customer_reviews.title: Love Amazon,
customer_reviews.text: An axle was missing, set to return as soon as I can get a label
customer_reviews.author: Paul Patricia

customer_reviews.title: Very nice stroller
customer_reviews.text: My granddaughters like the strollers. We wanted them to be somewhat maybe even 6 “ taller.
customer_reviews.author: Fran

customer_reviews.title: Very sturdy and great value for money
customer_reviews.text: I bought the doll and saw this for my 3 yr grand daughter. She loves it!
customer_reviews.author: kim jackson

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: Very cute. Easy to put together. Folds down nicely. My granddaughter loves it. Shes 23 months old.
customer_reviews.author: LoReah

customer_reviews.title: A gift
customer_reviews.text: Easy to assemble 5 minutes if that. My 2 year old Granddaughter loves it.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff

customer_reviews.title: Cute but cheaply made
customer_reviews.text: Very adorable... not sturdy. Most likely won’t last long. But cute while it’s here
customer_reviews.author: Patricia M.

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Perfect size for my 4 yo, great quality and its beautiful
customer_reviews.author: Luz Quintero

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy
customer_reviews.text: The only carriage that hasn't broke in a couple uses!
customer_reviews.author: Angelica and Joe

customer_reviews.title: Very cute and durable
customer_reviews.text: My grand daughter is 2 , she loves this and it is easy for her to push. Goes everywhere she goes.
customer_reviews.author: Shelby S.

customer_reviews.title: It exactly fits the baby alive dolls.
customer_reviews.text: My daughter enjoys playing with her stroller every day with her baby alive dolls.
customer_reviews.author: Shane Ross

customer_reviews.title: Great buy for baby lovers
customer_reviews.text: We got this for my 2 year old. She loves it! Super easy to set up and break down, the material is better than I expected but there isn’t anything to strap the bottom of the canopy from moving around. Which is minor, but my daughter throws a fit if it moves on her baby’s face lol
customer_reviews.author: Chachi Carrasco

customer_reviews.title: Our daughter loves it!
customer_reviews.text: Fits perfect for our daughter who just turned 4! Super easy to assemble and great quality!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: 2bYharMonY
customer_reviews.text: It’s to small my granddaughter has to bend to push
customer_reviews.author: Henry Cavill

customer_reviews.title: Best little carriage
customer_reviews.text: Super easy to put together and pushes smoothly. The girls love it!
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: Great with one small drawback.
customer_reviews.text: My granddaughter is rough on toys and this one seems indestructible and all the girls love it. One complaint is that the cover makes it difficult for the younger ones to get baby dolls in and out of the tram.
customer_reviews.author: Judy Reger

customer_reviews.title: Awful quality compared to price
customer_reviews.text: This stroller was pretty expensive and it was not quality. There is no way to keep the wheels on the stroller. They literally just fall off. Not sure how to fix this problem but super disappointed in it. For the price it should be much better quality.
customer_reviews.author: nicole

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase
customer_reviews.text: Great quality and easy to assemble! Good price as well.
customer_reviews.author: Angela

customer_reviews.title: great
customer_reviews.text: has lasted longer than any other stroller we have purchased. I have purchased many!
customer_reviews.author: Michael T.

customer_reviews.title: Great item!
customer_reviews.text: Totally adorable!!! We put it together in minutes and my grand daughter LOVES IT!! ❤️
customer_reviews.author: Ginny McCarron

customer_reviews.title: Adorable, sturdy
customer_reviews.text: Bought it for my 3 yr old granddaughter and she loves it! Seems sturdy and holds her 3 favorite babies.
customer_reviews.author: Stacy Foster

customer_reviews.title: Adorable
customer_reviews.text: This is soooo cute and it’s very well made. My daughter loves it and so do my boys.
customer_reviews.author: H. Hegazy

customer_reviews.title: Mostly good
customer_reviews.text: Super cute.. do not like the way it locks, seems backwards. And the part wear the baby doll lays is not stiff its just material and hangs done when a doll is in it.
customer_reviews.author: Erika

customer_reviews.title: Well built and plenty of room
customer_reviews.text: My granddaughter loves this for her Baby Alives Made very well
customer_reviews.author: shamrock

customer_reviews.title: Great for the family!
customer_reviews.text: Love it, its withstanding my 3 year old son and 4 year old daughter for along time!
customer_reviews.author: Nathan

customer_reviews.title: Great gift
customer_reviews.text: This is really cute and it is sturdy. It’s great for my 4 year old granddaughter. It fits her doll perfectly. She really loves her stroller and doll baby.
customer_reviews.author: Kathy Beecher

customer_reviews.title: Great gift
customer_reviews.text: We got this for our granddaughter and she loved it
customer_reviews.author: lifeisgoodtoday

customer_reviews.title: Easy assembly
customer_reviews.text: Just as pictured, my daughter loves it. Can fit 3 of her baby alives inside of it (sitting upwards)
customer_reviews.author: Tiarra M.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Best purchase I have made yet good quality, great price, daughter enjoy’s it everyday
customer_reviews.author: Candy

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Stroller
customer_reviews.text: Adorable stroller for my 5 year old. She is on the taller size and still was perfect for her. It’s easy to fold up and store.
customer_reviews.author: Patricia

customer_reviews.title: Cute!!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my 3yr old she loves it! Easy to put together no issue what so ever
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Trujillo

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to push for my 2 year old. She loves it!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very cute
customer_reviews.text: my friend's daughter loves it. best gift she has every got she said. ming bengtsson lason
customer_reviews.author: NC

customer_reviews.title: 2 wheels do not work!
customer_reviews.text: Two of the wheels do not work (will not stay on). Is there a way to get 2 new wheels? We have the whole stroller together. I would like to try this first before we take the whole thing apart, box it back up, and send it back. JM
customer_reviews.author: John M.

customer_reviews.title: I would definitely recommend
customer_reviews.text: Love this stroller! Extremely durable for my 2 year old daughter and she plays with it everyday
customer_reviews.author: sean michener

customer_reviews.title: Extremely disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I gave this as a gift and it was very embarrassing because within 2 days the whole lining on the coach began to fray and all that seals came off
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: Baby Alive Classic Doll Pram
product_meta.description: Doll pram is a classic style pram with a modern twist displaying fun, vibrant colors for little mommies and their dolls. The Diana pram includes a canopy, shopping basket and bassinet cover.
feature_bullets: Foldable steel tube frame with retractable canopy and large shopping basket
Foldable steel tube frame with retractable canopy and large shopping basket
Removable carry cot, which converts to a bed

specifications.Domestic Shipping: Item can be shipped within U.S.
specifications.International Shipping: This item can be shipped to select countries outside of the U.S. Learn More
specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.7 out of 5 stars1,078 ratings4.7 out of 5 stars
